alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 19 at 3:47AM EDT until March 21 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Watch, freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. For the second Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Bamberg and Southeastern Orangeburg Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Monday morning. For the second Freeze Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
